name: Decay (SynergyTS)
description:
Developer Foreword

This game is a student built project by Hex Studios as part of the Advanced Diploma of Game Development at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment.

The current build is Beta 3.20. Please leave any feedback as this helps guide our design choices in the future. Thank you, we hope you enjoy what we built!

The Development Team

https://showcase.aie.edu.au/project/decay/?preview_id=8394&preview_nonce=2145d6e...

Game Overview

A 2.5D chempunk fast-paced platformer game with skill-based mechanics that can be chained together to provide emergent solutions for gaining speed using the environment & technology.

In this game, players can:

  • Move (Walk, Jog, Run, Sprint)
  • Slide
  • Jump
  • Thrust
  • Grapple & Swing
  • Wall Slide & Jump

With the ultimate goal being to finish levels in the shortest times and earning the fastest runs ever!

If players successfully beat the existing high scores on our global leaderboard, they will be added to the Top 10 fastest runs ever!
